commit.message:
class.c (layout_class_type): Don't use PCC_BITFIELD_TYPE_MATTERS if not defined.

	* class.c (layout_class_type): Don't use
	PCC_BITFIELD_TYPE_MATTERS if not defined.

From-SVN: r60994

files.patch:

+	* class.c (layout_class_type): Don't use
+	PCC_BITFIELD_TYPE_MATTERS if not defined.
+
 2003-01-06  Mark Mitchell  <mark@codesourcery.com>
